DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
Flash Version: 9.0

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Bookworm Adventures Volume 2_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Stop the presses! The walls of fiction are collapsing as characters run wild through the Great Library, and only Lex the Bookworm can save the world from certain doom! In Bookworm Adventures Volume 2, build words and battle monsters to survive three storybooks with ten chapters each. Trade barbs, banter and body blows with over 130 foes, and earn help from fighting friends along the way! The better the word, the badder the damage -- so advance your word power with over 20 powerful treasures, including all-new Rainbow tiles. Work wordy wonders until dawn, because Bookworm Adventures Volume 2 is the premium game with full access to all content!
